org.apache.drill.exec.planner.logical

Class DrillFilterItemStarReWriterRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.drill.exec.planner.logical.DrillFilterItemStarReWriterRule

  • public class DrillFilterItemStarReWriterRule
extends Object
    Rule will transform item star fields in filter and replaced with actual field references. This will help partition pruning and push down rules to detect fields that can be pruned or push downed. Item star operator appears when sub-select or cte with star are used as source.
